# vultr_speed

## install

```
pip install vultr_speed
```

or

```
python setup.py install
```

## run

```
> vultr_speed

testing [Chicago, Illinois] il-us-ping.vultr.com result:
PING il-us-ping.vultr.com (107.191.51.12): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 107.191.51.12: icmp_seq=0 ttl=49 time=338.895 ms
64 bytes from 107.191.51.12: icmp_seq=1 ttl=49 time=359.421 ms
...

testing [Atlanta, Georgia] ga-us-ping.vultr.com result:
PING ga-us-ping.vultr.com (108.61.193.166): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 108.61.193.166: icmp_seq=0 ttl=49 time=355.215 ms
64 bytes from 108.61.193.166: icmp_seq=2 ttl=49 time=361.505 ms
...
...

```
